name: TheSweetSpot-weeklygolfshow
0:
”Alexa, play The Sweet Spot”
”Alexa, ask The Sweet Spot to play the latest episode”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the sweet spot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Sweet Spot is a weekly golf show with experts from the Racing Post and the world of golf.

Each week, the panel:

- Look back at the previous week's tournaments;
- Preview the coming weekend's tournaments and give their best bets;
- Chat about big stories in the game and answer viewers' questions.

New episodes are usually available every Tuesday evening and this Skill lets you view or listen to the most recent episode.

Just say "Alexa, play The Sweet Spot".

For Alexa devices with screens and Alexa on Fire TV, you will be able to view the full video. For audio-only Alexa devices, you will get the audio.

++ Responsible gambling ++
This skill is for persons aged 18+. Please gamble responsibly.

Help with problem gambling is available from the following organisations:
Gamble Aware: https://begambleaware.org
GamCare: https://www.gamcare.org.uk
Gamblers Anonymous: https://gamblersanonymous.org.uk

++ Further information and feedback ++
Racing Post is part of Spotlight Sports Group.
Visit https://spotlightsportsgroup.com for more information.

Spotlight Sports Group is a member of RAiG.
Visit https://raig.org for more information.

Please contact alexa@racingpost.com with any feedback on this skill.
